Key:
All right. We're at the meeting place. Who
was able to meet up?
Hadn't you heard from Kotori Itsuka?

That's the thing. She told me she would
see us later. I guess that means we should
wait.
Yes. I look forward to it too.

(Look forward to it? Maria was distant
from Tohka and the others. Hopefully this
will be their chance to become friends.)

Heeeey! You two! Sorry for keeping you
waiting!

Hm. It seems I'm the first to arrive.
Maria, let's have some fun.

Yes. Please take good care of me,
Tohka Yatogami.

Shido, I heard you are attending the date
with everyone. I cannot wait!
Yeah, leave it to me! Oh, by the way, Tohka.
Hm. Is something wrong, Shido?

I think Maria wants to strike up a friendship
with everyone.
Ohh.

So, if at all possible, I'd like you to befriend
Maria. What do you say?

Understood, so that's the case. Hm, trust me,
Shido. This is my area of expertise!
Haha. That's promising.

(I said it, but I didn't really mean it. Tohka
looks confident, but I'm still worried.)

Maria, today I will take you on a tour of my
favorite stores. I'll feed you a mountain of
sweets and savory treats!

(I knew it. Sure enough, she's already talking
about food.)
I see. I very much look forward to it.
Ah, darling. Sorry to keep you waiting～.

Heh heh heh. We've kept you. Shido,
and my underling, Tohka.
Miku and Kaguya, too. Thanks for coming.

Heh heh. We merely need to follow Maria as
she wanders, yes? For today, consider me your
shepherd.
Yes～. If it's a cute girl, leave it to me～.

(These two are reliable. Regardless, I can't put
the burden on their shoulders alone.)

Thank you for today. Kaguya Yamai, Miku
Izayoi.

Heh heh. Leave it to me. Arusu will be shaped
by my mighty wind of wisdom. Feel your soul
quiver from the maiden of hurricanes!
Indeed. Let the good times roll, Maria-chan.
Is this everyone? Then, let's head...
Oh, my. If it isn't Shido-san. Going somewhere?
K-Kurumi?!

Hmhmm. What a coincidence. I love the smell of
you in the morning, Shido-san.

Kurumi, you... This isn't some coincidence,
is it?

I haven’t the faintest idea of what you mean.
I saw an assortment of interesting individuals,
so I had to see what the commotion was about.

Then, Kurumi Tokisaki, we have scheduled a
group date. Would you like to join us?

My, a tempting offer. But would it be okay to
join unannounced?

Let's see. If Maria says it's okay, then you're
more than welcome to come along. How does
everyone else feel about that?
Yes. Today there will be no arguing.

Heh. Even with one additional person, our
objective is unchanged.

Then, I accept your invitation. I have been
curious about you for a while. I hope all of
us can get along.

Yes, same here. I, myself, have been taken
by your mysterious charm, Kurumi Tokisaki.
My, my.

(Wowie. Even Kurumi's had the poison
sucked out of her. Not bad, Maria.)

Shido, if we're done chatting, then let's begin
our conquest. Time is precious, after all.
Whoops. That's right. All right, then let's move.
Yeaaah!
Yeaaah!
Yeeeah, I believe.

(Now, Maria's first holiday celebration has
begun.)
